Text: Take Shelter: tells the story of Curtis Laforche, a husband and father of working class struggle to control his fear, the result of a series of terrifying apocalyptic nightmares. For Curtis, those dreams can only be two things: the harbinger of a supernatural storm or the first signs of something you have feared all his life. The immediate reaction of Curtis is to protect your family, Samantha, his wife, and Hannah, daughter of six years. But he was assailed by doubts: what are protecting? Did the storm or himself?
